title: Top o Nerae! - Novel Updates
tags: Aliens   Based on an Anime   Female Protagonist
author: Iino Fumihiko
description:
A novelization of the 6-episodes OVA, premiered in 1988

Noriko's dream is to become a space pilot like her father, Admiral Takaya. He died when she was still a little girl due to an attack of alien forces in deep space. 

After entering Okinawa Girls Space Pilot High School, Noriko is handpicked by instructor Ohta as someone with great potential. She must then persuade everyone, especially herself, that she can indeed fulfil her goal and become an accomplished pilot despite being just an ordinary girl.>
